faqs.question: What is the admission process?
faqs.answer: To apply for admission, you need to fill out the online application form available on the admissions page.

faqs.question: What are the courses offered?
faqs.answer: We offer various undergraduate and postgraduate programs. Visit the 'Courses' section on our website to view the complete list.

faqs.question: How can I contact the college administration?
faqs.answer: You can contact the administration via email at admin@mits.ac.in or call +91-123-456-7890.

faqs.question: How to check the Results?
faqs.answer: The results are available on the 'Exams portal' section of our website. You can download your respective grade cards.

faqs.question: What about placements?
faqs.answer: About placements, check the placements portal on our college website.

faqs.question: What about International Relationships?
faqs.answer: About International Relationships, check the International Relationships portal on our college website.
